name: miso-soup
description: Monorepo for the Miso Soup anime recommender platform
author: Marcos Rocha <marcosrocha85@gmail.com>

scripts.install: cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
